Dontmissoutonthelatestoffer: Don’t miss out on the latest offer
cust-forgotPwd: Dear customer kindly enter below your email which is registered with us.
cust-verfEmail: Please enter below the 6-digits OTP received in your email which is registered with us.
pm-all: dunyana accepts all types of credit/debit cards and online payment channels
pm-cod: a convenient and accessible payment option where payment is given man on the time of delivery.
pm-fod: Only and exclusively to dunyana customers, where the transfer fee is collected from the recipient upon the delivery with the shipper rate and not the cash rate.
pm-oda: dunyana can either collect, pickup or deliver shipments to a specific area that is not serviced regularly
pm-ins: The addition of the insurance option for both domestic and international shipments is a service provided by dunyana to its customers upon request, to protect the shipment from damage.
pm-hccs: We ensure that the shipment is kept free of charge for up to three business days when the recipient was not available on the day of delivery.
returns: The shipper may request the return of consignment or amend the address of the consignee, before delivery to the consignee. In addition, the beneficiary may be charged any additional fees as applicable
contact-us: At dunyana, we focus on customer’s satisfaction. We continue strive to earn your trust and provide a fully support to help find suitable solutions for their needs quickly and easily anytime.
shpTxt1: dunyana shall deliver all consignments to the address of the consignee, registered in the service contract, and shall be responsible for any loss, delay or miss delivery caused by it.
shpTxt2: The consignment shall be delivered to the named consignee or so authorized representative with applying restricted procedures to verify the identity of the recipient before handover.
shpTxt3: dunyana shall recollect any consignment with miss-delivered.
shpTxt4: Failure of delivery of a consignment due to the consignee's refusal to receive them or for any other reason by the beneficiary, dunyana shall apply the rules and procedures for dealing with the non-deliverable items declared in his platforms and service centers, provided that such rules shall take into account the number of attempts to be made for the receipt. , And these rules and procedures comply with international rules in this regard
shpTxt5: dunyana shall record and keep the procedures for dealing with postal materials that could not be delivered in a documented special register established for this purpose, for a period not less than one calendar year from the date of the action taken

faqAns1: For the best estimate, come into dunyana Office, so our pros can advise you on the correct box and the right shipping choice that fits your needs.
faqAns2: You can pay by cash for scheduled online pickups, or; You can visit any of our outlets and pay by credit card (Visa or MasterCard), or; Through our Monthly Invoices System for corporate customers with an dunyana account.
faqAns3: To ensure safety while shipping parcels, dunyana discourages shipment of prohibited, restricted and dangerous items to any destination. For more information, you can download and read our list of Prohibited and Restricted Items. Also note that some countries have additional restrictions, prohibitions, and acceptance processes for certain commodities. Please refer to the Customs Information page to check the prohibited/restricted items by country.
faqAns4: You can track your shipment via our website, Application, available for Android & IOS Unified number: 920020505 Twitter: dunyanaCare Email: CS@dunyana.com WhatsApp Bussiness: https://bit.ly/2ncMqix
faqAns5: After dunyana receive your order from shipper side you will receive an SMS to inform you about expected delivery date
faqAns6: For any further details please contact us on admin@dunyana.com
faqAns7: Commercial invoice. If the shipment need any other documents our representative will inform you.
faqAns8: International shipping duration depends on the origin and destination
faqAns9: You can use our service by calling our unified number & contact us via Email
faqAns10: You will receive an SMS once your shipment is out for delivery and our representative will call you
faqAns11: Local shipping is by land only. For international shipping is by air, by land & sea (for chosen countries)
faqAns12: From 9:00AM up to 2:00PM and from 4:00PM up to 9:00PM
faqAns13: Yes, please send an Email to admin@dunyana.com
faqAns14: Once dunyana receive your shipment you receive an SMS enter the link for entering your location, please make sure that your GPS is turned on.
our-story-mission: dunyana aims to become the most preferred ecommerce website for both businesses and individual shoppers in Saudi Arabia and the rest of the Middle East, whilst extending its footprint across the three continents of Asia, Europe and Africa.
Check your registered Email address for: Check your registered Email address for One-Time-Password(OTP) and enter the code here
aboutusstory: We connect you to shop from around the world using our ‘easy to use’ platform and get it delivered to your door-step smoothly.
howdunyanadata: Have a rewarding shopping experience by following
Select your favorite brand and product: Select your favorite brand and product
Once you have completed these simple ste: Once you have completed these simple steps

Credit 5% of your purchases into your Du: Credit 5% of your purchases into your dunyana wallet

becomeasellercontent: We make selling your products online quick and easy, giving full control of your e-commerce operations. We promote your products on your behalf and give you an easy access to markets in Saudi Arabia and the rest of the Middle East

2005: A joint-venture between Saudi Post [51%] and Arabian Hala Company [49%], forming Naqel.
2015: Courier license-UAE NAQEL airport facilities in Dammam [10,000 SQM]
2017-2018: Expansion into Oman, Kuwait Jordan, Egypt, Lebanon, UK & China
1994: HALA Express operations starts with a fleet of +150 vehicles.
2014: NAQEL was granted Courier license from the Saudi authorities [1of 7 companies].
2016: Operations Set-up in Qatar and Bahrain.
HowcanIapplyonlineans: Shopping in Diana is fast and easy, with registered users reviewing the product by category, selecting and checking out for payment.
severalformsofpayment: In our world, we accept several forms of payment
severalformsofpayment2: Insurance and the latest payment types Apple Pay and STC Pay.
myorder?: How can I find my order?
myorderans: After placing your order in Dniana, you will immediately receive an email containing the order number, and purchase details in your registered email. You can view your order details in your account details and order history as well. You can also track the shipping status of your bill of lading and the reference number in your dniana account, and if you need more details, our customer service is always ready to help you.
privacy-policy_parg1: dunyana built the dunyana app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by dunyana at no cost and is intended for use as is.
privacy-policy_parg2: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
privacy-policy_parg3: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy-policy_parg4: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at dunyana unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.
privacy-policy_parg6: For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.
privacy-policy_parg7: The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacy-policy_parg8: Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app
privacy-policy_parg11: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacy-policy_parg13: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
privacy-policy_parg14: This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacy-policy_parg16: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons
privacy-policy_parg18: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacy-policy_parg20: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
privacy-policy_parg21: We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacy-policy_parg23: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy-policy_parg25: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacy-policy_parg27: These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.
privacy-policy_parg29: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.
privacy-policy_parg31: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at NaqelDunyana@gmail.com.
